subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hanley Ramirez homered twice as Los Angeles beat Arizona and won its division for the first time since 2009, and John Lackey led Boston past Baltimore for the Red Sox’ first playoff berth since 2009.
snippet: Hanley Ramirez homered twice as Los Angeles beat Arizona and won its division for the first time since 2009, and John Lackey led Boston past Baltimore for the Red Sox’ first playoff berth since 2009.
